author_blurb.en: Translated for SuttaCentral by Sujato Bhikkhu

segments.en: “Mendicants, these four people are found in the world.

segments.pli: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sīlesu na paripūrakārī hoti, samādhismiṃ na paripūrakārī, paññāya na paripūrakārī.
segments.en: One person has not fulfilled ethics, immersion, or wisdom.

segments.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sīlesu paripūrakārī hoti, samādhismiṃ na paripūrakārī, paññāya na paripūrakārī.
segments.en: One person has fulfilled ethics, but not immersion or wisdom.

segments.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sīlesu paripūrakārī hoti, samādhismiṃ paripūrakārī, paññāya na paripūrakārī.
segments.en: One person has fulfilled ethics and immersion, but not wisdom.

segments.pli: Idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sīlesu paripūrakārī hoti, samādhismiṃ paripūrakārī, paññāya paripūrakārī.
segments.en: One person has fulfilled ethics, immersion, and wisdom.

segments.pli: Ime kho, bhikkhave, cattāro puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
segments.en: These are the four people found in the world.”

sections.title: “Mendicants, these four people are found in the world.
